Base.name: Cellar
Base.rules: +1 Action, Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.

Base.name: Chapel
Base.rules: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

Base.name: Moat
Base.rules: +2 Cards, When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

Base.name: Chancellor
Base.rules: +2 Coins, You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

Base.name: Village
Base.rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions.

Base.name: Woodcutter
Base.rules: +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

Base.name: Workshop
Base.rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

Base.name: Bureaucrat
Base.rules: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

Base.name: Feast
Base.rules: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

Base.name: Gardens
Base.rules: Variable, Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

Base.name: Militia
Base.rules: +2 Coins, Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

Base.name: Moneylender
Base.rules: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +3 Coins.

Base.name: Remodel
Base.rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

Base.name: Smithy
Base.rules: +3 Cards.

Base.name: Spy
Base.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionEach player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.

Base.name: Thief
Base.rules: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

Base.name: Throne Room
Base.rules: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.

Base.name: Council Room
Base.rules: +4 Cards, +1 Buy, Each other player draws a card.

Base.name: Festival
Base.rules: +2 Actions, +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

Base.name: Laboratory
Base.rules: +2 Cards, +1 Action.

Base.name: Library
Base.rules: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

Base.name: Market
Base.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin.

Base.name: Mine
Base.rules: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more; put it into your hand.

Base.name: Witch
Base.rules: +2 Cards, Each other player gains a Curse card.

Base.name: Adventurer
Base.rules: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

Intrigue.name: Courtyard
Intrigue.rules: +3 Card, Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

Intrigue.name: Pawn
Intrigue.rules: Choose two: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin. (The choices must be different.).

Intrigue.name: Secret Chamber
Intrigue.rules: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. - When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

Intrigue.name: Great Hall
Intrigue.rules: 1 Victory, +1 Card, +1 Action.

Intrigue.name: Masquerade
Intrigue.rules: +2 CardsEach player passes a card from his hand to the left at once. Then you may trash a card from your hand.

Intrigue.name: Shanty Town
Intrigue.rules: +2 Actions, Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

Intrigue.name: Steward
Intrigue.rules: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2 Coins; or trash 2 cards from your hand.

Intrigue.name: Swindler
Intrigue.rules: +2 Coins, Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.

Intrigue.name: Wishing Well
Intrigue.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it is the named card, put it in your hand.

Intrigue.name: Baron
Intrigue.rules: +1 Buy, You may discard an Estate card. If you do, +4 Coins. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.

Intrigue.name: Bridge
Intrigue.rules: +1 Buy, +1 Coin. All cards (including cards in players' hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but not less than 0 Coins.

Intrigue.name: Conspirator
Intrigue.rules: +2 Coins. If you've played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card, +1 Action.

Intrigue.name: Coppersmith
Intrigue.rules: Copper produces an extra 1 Coin this turn.

Intrigue.name: Ironworks
Intrigue.rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. If it is an... Action card, +1 Action. Treasure card, +1 Coin. Victory card, +1 Card.

Intrigue.name: Mining Village
Intrigue.rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions. You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +2 Coins.

Intrigue.name: Scout
Intrigue.rules: +1 Action. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.

Intrigue.name: Duke
Intrigue.rules: Worth 1 Victory per Duchy you have.

Intrigue.name: Minion
Intrigue.rules: +1 Action, Choose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

Intrigue.name: Saboteur
Intrigue.rules: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2 Coins less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

Intrigue.name: Torturer
Intrigue.rules: +3 Card, Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

Intrigue.name: Trading Post
Intrigue.rules: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a silver card; put it into your hand.

Intrigue.name: Tribute
Intrigue.rules: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an... Action Card, +2 Actions; Treasure Card, +2 Coins; Victory Card, +2 Cards.

Intrigue.name: Upgrade
Intrigue.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

Intrigue.name: Harem
Intrigue.rules: 2 Coins, 2 Victory.

Intrigue.name: Nobles
Intrigue.rules: 2 Victory, Choose one: +3 Cards, or +2 Actions.

Seaside.name: Embargo
Seaside.rules: +2 Coins, Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile. - When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

Seaside.name: Haven
Seaside.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

Seaside.name: Lighthouse
Seaside.rules: +1 Action, Now and at the start of your next turn: +1 Coin. - While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.

Seaside.name: Native Village
Seaside.rules: +2 Actions, Choose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand.  You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.

Seaside.name: Pearl Diver
Seaside.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

Seaside.name: Ambassador
Seaside.rules: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

Seaside.name: Fishing Village
Seaside.rules: +2 Actions, +1 Coin, At the start of your next turn: +1 Action, +1 Coin.

Seaside.name: Lookout
Seaside.rules: +1 Action, Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

Seaside.name: Smugglers
Seaside.rules: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

Seaside.name: Warehouse
Seaside.rules: +3 Card, +1 Action, Discard 3 cards.

Seaside.name: Caravan
Seaside.rules: +1 Card, +1 ActionAt the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

Seaside.name: Cutpurse
Seaside.rules: +2 Coins, Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

Seaside.name: Island
Seaside.rules: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.2 VP

Seaside.name: Navigator
Seaside.rules: +2 Coins, Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

Seaside.name: Pirate Ship
Seaside.rules: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.

Seaside.name: Salvager
Seaside.rules: +1 Buy, Trash a card from your hand. +Coins equal to its cost.

Seaside.name: Sea Hag
Seaside.rules: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

Seaside.name: Treasure Map
Seaside.rules: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

Seaside.name: Bazaar
Seaside.rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions, +1 Coin.

Seaside.name: Explorer
Seaside.rules: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

Seaside.name: Ghost Ship
Seaside.rules: +2 Card, Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

Seaside.name: Merchant Ship
Seaside.rules: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins.

Seaside.name: Outpost
Seaside.rules: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn's Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can't cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.

Seaside.name: Tactician
Seaside.rules: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Buy, and +1 Action.

Seaside.name: Treasury
Seaside.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Coin, When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

Seaside.name: Wharf
Seaside.rules: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, +1 Buy.

Alchemy.name: Transmute
Alchemy.rules: Trash a card from your hand.If it is an...Action card, gain a DuchyTreasure card, gain a TransmuteVictory card, gain a Gold

Alchemy.name: Vineyard
Alchemy.rules: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

Alchemy.name: Apothecary
Alchemy.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionReveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck in any order.

Alchemy.name: Herbalist
Alchemy.rules: +1 Buy+1 CoinWhen you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.

Alchemy.name: Scrying Pool
Alchemy.rules: +1 ActionEach player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn't an Action.Put all of your revealed cards into your hand.

Alchemy.name: University
Alchemy.rules: +2 ActionsYou may gain an Action card costing up to 5 Coins.

Alchemy.name: Alchemist
Alchemy.rules: +2 Cards+1 ActionWhen you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.

Alchemy.name: Familiar
Alchemy.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionEach other player gains a curse.

Alchemy.name: Philosopher's Stone
Alchemy.rules: When you play this, count your deck and discard pile.Worth 1 Coin per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).

Alchemy.name: Golem
Alchemy.rules: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards.Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

Alchemy.name: Apprentice
Alchemy.rules: +1 ActionTrash a card from your hand.+1 Card per Coin it costs.+2 Cards if it has Potion in its cost.

Alchemy.name: Possession
Alchemy.rules: The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him.Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.

Prosperity.name: Loan
Prosperity.rules: Worth 1 Coin.When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

Prosperity.name: Trade Route
Prosperity.rules: +1 Buy+1 Coin per token on the Trade Route mat.Trash a card from your hand.Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.

Prosperity.name: Watchtower
Prosperity.rules: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.

Prosperity.name: Bishop
Prosperity.rules: +1 Coin+1 <VP>Trash a card from your hand. +<VP> equal to half its cost in Coins, rounded down.Each other player may trash a card from his hand.

Prosperity.name: Monument
Prosperity.rules: +2 Coins; +1 <VP>

Prosperity.name: Quarry
Prosperity.rules: Worth 1 Coin.While this is in play, Action cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.

Prosperity.name: Talisman
Prosperity.rules: Worth 1 Coin.While this is in play, when you buy a card costing 4 Coins or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

Prosperity.name: Worker's Village
Prosperity.rules: +1 Card+2 Actions+1 Buy

Prosperity.name: City
Prosperity.rules: +1 Card+2 ActionsIf there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +1 Coin and +1 Buy.

Prosperity.name: Contraband
Prosperity.rules: Worth 3 Coins.+1 BuyWhen you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.

Prosperity.name: Counting House
Prosperity.rules: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

Prosperity.name: Mint
Prosperity.rules: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it.When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

Prosperity.name: Mountebank
Prosperity.rules: +2 CoinsEach other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse and a Copper.

Prosperity.name: Rabble
Prosperity.rules: +3 CardsEach other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.

Prosperity.name: Royal Seal
Prosperity.rules: Worth 2 Coins.While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.

Prosperity.name: Vault
Prosperity.rules: +2 CardsDiscard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded.Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

Prosperity.name: Venture
Prosperity.rules: Worth 1 Coin.When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

Prosperity.name: Goons
Prosperity.rules: +1 Buy+2 CoinsEach other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 <VP>.

Prosperity.name: Grand Market
Prosperity.rules: +1 Card+1 Action+1 Buy+2 CoinsYou can't buy this if you have any Copper in play.

Prosperity.name: Hoard
Prosperity.rules: Worth 2 Coins.While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

Prosperity.name: Bank
Prosperity.rules: Worth ? Coins.When you play this, it`s worth 1 Coin per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

Prosperity.name: Expand
Prosperity.rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card.

Prosperity.name: Forge
Prosperity.rules: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in Coins of the trashed cards.

Prosperity.name: King's Court
Prosperity.rules: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

Prosperity.name: Peddler
Prosperity.rules: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 CoinDuring your Buy phase, this costs 2 Coins less per Action card you have in play, but not less than 0 Coins.

Prosperity.name: Platinum
Prosperity.rules: 5 Coins.

Cornucopia.name: Bag of Gold
Cornucopia.rules: +1 ActionGain a Gold, putting it on top of your deck.(This is not in the Supply.)

Cornucopia.name: Diadem
Cornucopia.rules: Worth 2 Coins.When you play this, +1 Coin per unused Action you have (Action, not Action card).(This is not in the Supply.)

Cornucopia.name: Followers
Cornucopia.rules: +2 CardsGain an Estate. Each other player gains a Curse and discards down to 3 cards in hand.(This is not in the Supply.)

Cornucopia.name: Princess
Cornucopia.rules: +1 BuyWhile this is in play, cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.(This is not in the Supply.)

Cornucopia.name: Trusty Steed
Cornucopia.rules: Choose two: +2 Cards; +2 Actions; +2 Coins; gain 4 Silvers and put your deck into your discard pile.(The choices must be different)(This is not in the Supply.)

Cornucopia.name: Hamlet
Cornucopia.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionYou may discard a card; If you do, +1 Action.You may discard a card; If you do, +1 Buy.

Cornucopia.name: Fortune Teller
Cornucopia.rules: +2 CoinsEach other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.

Cornucopia.name: Menagerie
Cornucopia.rules: +1 ActionReveal your hand.If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards.Otherwise, +1 Card.

Cornucopia.name: Farming Village
Cornucopia.rules: +2 ActionsReveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.

Cornucopia.name: Horse Traders
Cornucopia.rules: +1 Buy+3 CoinsDiscard 2 CardsWhen another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.

Cornucopia.name: Remake
Cornucopia.rules: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand, then gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than the trashed card.

Cornucopia.name: Tournament
Cornucopia.rules: +1 ActionEach player may reveal a Province from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no-one else does, +1 Card +1 Coin.

Cornucopia.name: Young Witch
Cornucopia.rules: +2 CardsDiscard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand.If he doesn�t, he gains a Curse.Setup: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing 2 Coins or 3 Coins to the Supply. Cards from that pile are Bane cards.

Cornucopia.name: Harvest
Cornucopia.rules: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.

Cornucopia.name: Horn of Plenty
Cornucopia.rules: 0 CoinsWhen you play this, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it�s a Victory card, trash this.

Cornucopia.name: Hunting Party
Cornucopia.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionReveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn�t a duplicate of one in your hand. Put it into your hand and discard the rest.

Cornucopia.name: Jester
Cornucopia.rules: +2 CoinsEach other player discards the top card of his deck. If it�s a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.

Cornucopia.name: Fairgrounds
Cornucopia.rules: Worth 2 VP for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (rounded down)

Hinterlands.name: Crossroads
Hinterlands.rules: Reveal your hand.+1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.

Hinterlands.name: Duchess
Hinterlands.rules: +2 CoinsEach player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back.In games using this, when you gain a Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.

Hinterlands.name: Fool's Gold
Hinterlands.rules: If this is the first time you played a Fool's Gold this turn, this is worth 1 Coin, otherwise it's worth 4 Coins.When another player gains a Province, you may trash this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold, putting it on your deck.

Hinterlands.name: Develop
Hinterlands.rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it and a card costing exactly 1 less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.

Hinterlands.name: Oasis
Hinterlands.rules: +1 Card+1 Action+1 CoinDiscard a card.

Hinterlands.name: Oracle
Hinterlands.rules: Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose one: either he discards them, or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses.+2 Cards

Hinterlands.name: Scheme
Hinterlands.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionAt the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.

Hinterlands.name: Tunnel
Hinterlands.rules: 2 VP [large shield]When you discard this other than during a Clean-up phase, you may reveal it. If you do, gain a Gold.

Hinterlands.name: Jack of all Trades
Hinterlands.rules: Gain a Silver.Look at the top card of your deck; discard it or put it back.Draw until you have 5 cards in hand.You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.

Hinterlands.name: Noble Brigand
Hinterlands.rules: +1 CoinWhen you buy this or play it, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Silver or Gold you choose, and discards the rest. If he didn't reveal a Treasure, he gains a Copper. You gain the trashed cards.

Hinterlands.name: Nomad Camp
Hinterlands.rules: +1 Buy+2 CoinsWhen you gain this, put it on top of your deck.

Hinterlands.name: Silk Road
Hinterlands.rules: Worth 1 VP for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).

Hinterlands.name: Spice Merchant
Hinterlands.rules: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. If you do, choose one:+2 Cards and +1 Action;or +2 Coins and +1 Buy.

Hinterlands.name: Trader
Hinterlands.rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a number of Silvers equal to its cost in Coins.When you would gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, instead, gain a silver.

Hinterlands.name: Cache
Hinterlands.rules: Worth 3 CoinsWhen you gain this, gain two Coppers.

Hinterlands.name: Cartographer
Hinterlands.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionLook at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

Hinterlands.name: Embassy
Hinterlands.rules: +5 CardsDiscard 3 cards.When you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.

Hinterlands.name: Haggler
Hinterlands.rules: +2 CoinsWhile this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.

Hinterlands.name: Highway
Hinterlands.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionWhile this is in play, cards cost 1 Coin less, but not less than 0 Coins.

Hinterlands.name: Ill-Gotten Gains
Hinterlands.rules: Worth 1 CoinWhen you play this, you may gain a Copper, putting it into your hand.When you gain this, each other player gains a Curse.

Hinterlands.name: Inn
Hinterlands.rules: +2 Cards+2 ActionsDiscard 2 cards.When you gain this, look through your discard pile (including this), reveal any number of Action cards from it, and shuffle them into your deck.

Hinterlands.name: Mandarin
Hinterlands.rules: +3 CoinsPut a card from your hand on top of your deck.When you gain this, put all Treasures you have in play on top of your deck in any order.

Hinterlands.name: Margrave
Hinterlands.rules: +3 Cards+1 BuyEach other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.

Hinterlands.name: Stables
Hinterlands.rules: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 Cards and +1 Action.

Hinterlands.name: Border Village
Hinterlands.rules: +1 Card+2 ActionsWhen you gain this, gain a card costing less than this.

Hinterlands.name: Farmland
Hinterlands.rules: 2 VPWhen you buy this, trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

Dark Ages.name: Abandoned Mine
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Coin

Dark Ages.name: Madman
Dark Ages.rules: +2 ActionsReturn this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand.(This card is not in the supply.)

Dark Ages.name: Mercenary
Dark Ages.rules: You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, +2 Coins, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. (This is not in the Supply.)

Dark Ages.name: Ruined Library
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Card

Dark Ages.name: Ruined Market
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Buy

Dark Ages.name: Ruined Village
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Action

Dark Ages.name: Spoils
Dark Ages.rules: 3 CoinsWhen you play this, return it to the Spoils pile.(This is not in the Supply.)

Dark Ages.name: Survivors
Dark Ages.rules: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.

Dark Ages.name: Hovel
Dark Ages.rules: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.

Dark Ages.name: Necropolis
Dark Ages.rules: +2 Actions

Dark Ages.name: Overgrown Estate
Dark Ages.rules: 0 VictoryWhen you trash this, +1 Card.

Dark Ages.name: Poor House
Dark Ages.rules: +4 CoinsReveal your hand. -1 Coin per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of 0 Coins.

Dark Ages.name: Beggar
Dark Ages.rules: Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand.When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.

Dark Ages.name: Squire
Dark Ages.rules: +1 CoinChoose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver.When you trash this, gain an Attack card.

Dark Ages.name: Vagrant
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Card, +1 ActionReveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Curse, Ruins, Shelter, or Victory card, put it into your hand.

Dark Ages.name: Forager
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Action, +1 BuyTrash a card from your hand. +1 Coin per differently named Treasure in the trash.

Dark Ages.name: Hermit
Dark Ages.rules: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card from your discard pile or hand that is not a Treasure. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.When you discard this from play, if you did not buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman from the Madman pile.

Dark Ages.name: Market Square
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 BuyWhen one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.

Dark Ages.name: Sage
Dark Ages.rules: +1 ActionReveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing 3 Coins or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

Dark Ages.name: Storeroom
Dark Ages.rules: +1 BuyDiscard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded the second time.

Dark Ages.name: Urchin
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Card, +1 ActionEach other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a mercenary from the Mercenary pile.

Dark Ages.name: Armory
Dark Ages.rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, putting it on top of your deck.

Dark Ages.name: Death Cart
Dark Ages.rules: +5 CoinsYou may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don't, trash this.When you gain this, gain 2 Ruins.

Dark Ages.name: Feodum
Dark Ages.rules: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Silvers in your deck (round down).When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

Dark Ages.name: Fortress
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Card, +2 ActionsWhen you trash this, put it into your hand.

Dark Ages.name: Ironmonger
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Card, +1 ActionReveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. Either way, if it is an�Action card, +1 ActionTreasure card, +1 CoinVictory card, +1 Card

Dark Ages.name: Marauder
Dark Ages.rules: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

Dark Ages.name: Procession
Dark Ages.rules: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

Dark Ages.name: Rats
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Card, +1 ActionGain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).When you tash this, +1 Card.

Dark Ages.name: Scavenger
Dark Ages.rules: +1 CoinsYou may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.

Dark Ages.name: Sir Martin
Dark Ages.rules: +2 BuysEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Dark Ages.name: Wandering Minstrel
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Card, +2 ActionsReveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.

Dark Ages.name: Band of Misfits
Dark Ages.rules: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose.This is that card until it leaves play.

Dark Ages.name: Bandit Camp
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Card, +2 ActionsGain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.

Dark Ages.name: Catacombs
Dark Ages.rules: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards.When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

Dark Ages.name: Count
Dark Ages.rules: Choose one: Discard 2 cards; or put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper.Choose one: +3 Coins; or trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.

Dark Ages.name: Counterfeit
Dark Ages.rules: 1 Coin+1 BuyWhen you play this, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that Treasure.

Dark Ages.name: Cultist
Dark Ages.rules: +2 CardsEach other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand.When you trash this, +3 Cards.

Dark Ages.name: Dame Anna
Dark Ages.rules: You may trash up to 2 cards from your hand.Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Dark Ages.name: Dame Josephine
Dark Ages.rules: 2 VictoryEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Dark Ages.name: Dame Molly
Dark Ages.rules: +2 ActionsEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Dark Ages.name: Dame Natalie
Dark Ages.rules: You may gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Dark Ages.name: Dame Sylvia
Dark Ages.rules: +2 CoinsEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Dark Ages.name: Graverobber
Dark Ages.rules: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

Dark Ages.name: Junk Dealer
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 CoinTrash a card from your hand.

Dark Ages.name: Mystic
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Action, +2 CoinsName a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.

Dark Ages.name: Pillage
Dark Ages.rules: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose.Gain 2 Spoils from the Spoils pile.

Dark Ages.name: Rebuild
Dark Ages.rules: +1 ActionName a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

Dark Ages.name: Rogue
Dark Ages.rules: +2 CoinsIf there are any cards in the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest.

Dark Ages.name: Sir Bailey
Dark Ages.rules: +1 Card, +1 ActionEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Dark Ages.name: Sir Destry
Dark Ages.rules: +2 CardsEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Dark Ages.name: Sir Michael
Dark Ages.rules: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Dark Ages.name: Sir Vander
Dark Ages.rules: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.When you trash this, gain a Gold.

Dark Ages.name: Altar
Dark Ages.rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

Dark Ages.name: Hunting Grounds
Dark Ages.rules: +4 CardsWhen you trash this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

Guilds.name: Candlestick Maker
Guilds.rules: +1 Action, +1 Buy Take a Coin token.

Guilds.name: Stonemason
Guilds.rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain 2 cards each costing less than it.When you buy this, you may overpay for it.If you do, gain 2 Action cards each costing the amount you overpaid.

Guilds.name: Doctor
Guilds.rules: Name a card. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash the matches. Put the rest back on top in any order.When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each 1 Coin you overpaid, look at the top card of your deck; trash it, discard it, or put it back.

Guilds.name: Masterpiece
Guilds.rules: 1 CoinWhen you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain a Silver per 1 Coin you overpaid.

Guilds.name: Advisor
Guilds.rules: +1 ActionReveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card. Put the other cards into your hand.

Guilds.name: Herald
Guilds.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionReveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Action, play it.When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each 1 Coin you overpaid, look through your discard pile and put a card from it on top of your deck.

Guilds.name: Plaza
Guilds.rules: +1 Card+2 ActionsYou may discard a Treasure card. If you do, take a Coin token.

Guilds.name: Taxman
Guilds.rules: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals a hand without it). Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card, putting it on top of your deck.

Guilds.name: Baker
Guilds.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionTake a Coin token.Setup: Each player takes a Coin token.

Guilds.name: Butcher
Guilds.rules: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand and then pay any number of Coin tokens. If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

Guilds.name: Journeyman
Guilds.rules: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

Guilds.name: Merchant Guild
Guilds.rules: +1 Buy+1 CoinWhile this is in play, when you buy a card, take a Coin token.

Guilds.name: Soothsayer
Guilds.rules: Gain a gold. Each other player gains a Curse. Each player who did draws a card.

Adventures.name: Coin of the Realm
Adventures.rules: 1 CoinWhen you play this, put it on your Tavern mat.Directly after resolving an Action, you may call this, for +2 Actions.

Adventures.name: Page
Adventures.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionWhen you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Treasure Hunter.

Adventures.name: Peasant
Adventures.rules: +1 Buy+1 CoinWhen you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Soldier.

Adventures.name: Ratcatcher
Adventures.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionPut this on your Tavern mat.At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand.

Adventures.name: Raze
Adventures.rules: +1 ActionTrash this or a card from your hand. Look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the cost in Coins of the trashed card. Put one into your hand and discard the rest.

Adventures.name: Amulet
Adventures.rules: Now and at the start of your next turn, choose one: +1 Coin; or trash a card from your hand; or gain a Silver.

Adventures.name: Caravan Guard
Adventures.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionAt the start of your next turn, +1 Coin.When another player plays an Attack card, you may play this from your hand. (+1 Action has no effect if it's not your turn.)

Adventures.name: Dungeon
Adventures.rules: +1 ActionNow and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, then discard 2 cards.

Adventures.name: Gear
Adventures.rules: +2 CardsSet aside up to 2 cards from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put them into your hand.

Adventures.name: Guide
Adventures.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionPut this on your Tavern mat.At the start of your turn, you may call this, to discard your hand and draw 5 cards.

Adventures.name: Duplicate
Adventures.rules: Put this on your Tavern mat.When you gain a card costing up to 6 Coins, you may call this, to gain a copy of that card.

Adventures.name: Magpie
Adventures.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionReveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Treasure, put it into your hand. If it's an Action or Victory card, gain a Magpie.

Adventures.name: Messenger
Adventures.rules: +1 Buy+2 CoinsYou may put your deck into your discard pile.When this is your first buy in a turn, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, and each other player gains a copy of it.

Adventures.name: Miser
Adventures.rules: Choose one: Put a Copper from your hand onto your Tavern mat; or +1 Coin per Copper on your Tavern mat.

Adventures.name: Port
Adventures.rules: +1 Card+2 ActionsWhen you buy this, gain another Port.

Adventures.name: Ranger
Adventures.rules: +1 BuyTurn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face up, +5 Cards.

Adventures.name: Transmogrify
Adventures.rules: +1 ActionPut this on your Tavern mat.At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin more than it, and put that card into your hand.

Adventures.name: Artificer
Adventures.rules: +1 Card+1 Action+1 CoinDiscard any number of cards. You may gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin per card discarded, putting it on top of your deck.

Adventures.name: Bridge Troll
Adventures.rules: Each other player takes his -1 Coin token. Now and at the start of your next turn:+1 BuyWhile this is in play, cards cost 1 Coin less on your turns, but not less than 0 Coins.

Adventures.name: Distant Lands
Adventures.rules: Put this on your Tavern mat.Worth 4 Victory if on your Tavern mat at the end of the game (otherwise worth 0 Victory).

Adventures.name: Giant
Adventures.rules: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face down, +1 Coin. If it's face up, +5 Coins, and each other player reveals the top card of his deck, trashes it if it costs from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and otherwise discards it and gains a Curse.

Adventures.name: Haunted Woods
Adventures.rules: Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he puts his hand on top of his deck in any order.At the start of your next turn:+3 Cards

Adventures.name: Lost City
Adventures.rules: +2 Cards+2 ActionsWhen you gain this, each other player draws a card.

Adventures.name: Relic
Adventures.rules: 2 CoinsWhen you play this, each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

Adventures.name: Royal Carriage
Adventures.rules: +1 ActionPut this on your Tavern mat.Directly after resolving an Action, if it's still in play, you may call this, to replay that Action.

Adventures.name: Storyteller
Adventures.rules: +1 Action+1 CoinPlay up to 3 Treasures from your hand. Pay all of your Coins; +1 Card per Coin paid.

Adventures.name: Swamp Hag
Adventures.rules: Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he gains a Curse.At the start of your next turn:+3 Coins

Adventures.name: Treasure Trove
Adventures.rules: 2 CoinsWhen you play this, gain a Gold and a Copper.

Adventures.name: Wine Merchant
Adventures.rules: +1 Buy+4 CoinsPut this on your Tavern mat.At the end of your Buy phase, if you have at least 2 Coins unspent, you may discard this from your Tavern mat.

Adventures.name: Hireling
Adventures.rules: At the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game:+1 Card(This stays in play.)

Adventures.name: Soldier
Adventures.rules: +2 Coins+1 Coin per other Attack you have in play. Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand discards a card.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Fugitive.This is not in the Supply.)

Adventures.name: Fugitive
Adventures.rules: +2 Cards+1ActionDiscard a card.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Disciple.(This card is not in the Supply.)

Adventures.name: Disciple
Adventures.rules: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Gain a copy of it.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Teacher.(This is not in the Supply.)

Adventures.name: Teacher
Adventures.rules: Put this on your Tavern mat.At the start of your turn, you may call this, to move your +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, or +1 Coin token to an Action Supply pile you have no tokens on (when you play a card from that pile, you first get that bonus).(This is not in the Supply.)

Adventures.name: Treasure Hunter
Adventures.rules: +1 Action+1 CoinGain a Silver per card the player to your right gained in his last turn.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Warrior.(This is not in the Supply.)

Adventures.name: Warrior
Adventures.rules: +2 CardsFor each Traveller you have in play (including this), each other player discards the top card of his deck and trashes it if it costs 3 Coins or 4 Coins.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Hero.(This is not in the Supply.)

Adventures.name: Hero
Adventures.rules: +2 CoinsGain a Treasure.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Champion.(This is not in the Supply.)

Adventures.name: Champion
Adventures.rules: +1 ActionFor the rest of the game, when another player plays an Attack, it doesn't affect you, and when you play an Action, +1 Action.(This stays in play. This is not in the Supply.)

Adventures.name: Alms
Adventures.rules: Once per turn: If you have no Treasures in play, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

Adventures.name: Borrow
Adventures.rules: +1 BuyOnce per turn: If your -1 Card token isn't on your deck, put it there and +1 Coin.

Adventures.name: Quest
Adventures.rules: You may discard an Attack, two Curses, or six cards. If you do, gain a Gold.

Adventures.name: Save
Adventures.rules: +1 BuyOnce per turn: Set aside a card from your hand, and put it into your hand at end of turn (after drawing).

Adventures.name: Scouting Party
Adventures.rules: +1 BuyLook at the top 5 cards of your deck. Discard 3 of them and put the rest back in any order.

Adventures.name: Travelling Fair
Adventures.rules: +2 BuysWhen you gain a card this turn, you may put it on top of your deck.

Adventures.name: Bonfire
Adventures.rules: Trash up to 2 cards you have in play.

Adventures.name: Expedition
Adventures.rules: Draw 2 extra cards for your next hand.

Adventures.name: Ferry
Adventures.rules: Move your -2 Coins cost token to an Action Supply pile (cards from that pile cost 2 Coins less on your turns, but  not less than 0 Coins).

Adventures.name: Plan
Adventures.rules: Move your Trashing token to an Action supply pile (when you buy a card from that pile, you may trash a card from your hand.)

Adventures.name: Mission
Adventures.rules: Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, take another turn after this one, in which you can't buy cards.

Adventures.name: Pilgrimage
Adventures.rules: Once per turn: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up); then if it's face up, choose up to 3 differently named cards you have in play and gain a copy of each.

Adventures.name: Ball
Adventures.rules: Take your -1 Coin token. Gain 2 cards each costing up to 4 Coins.

Adventures.name: Raid
Adventures.rules: Gain a Silver per Silver you have in play. Each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

Adventures.name: Seaway
Adventures.rules: Gain an Action card costing up to 4 Coins. Move your +1 Buy token to its pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Buy).

Adventures.name: Trade
Adventures.rules: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. Gain a Silver per card you trashed.

Adventures.name: Lost Arts
Adventures.rules: Move your +1 Action token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Action).

Adventures.name: Training
Adventures.rules: Move your +1 Coin token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Coin).

Adventures.name: Inheritance
Adventures.rules: Once per game: Set aside a non-Victory Action card from the Supply costing up to 4 Coins. Move your Estate token to it (your Estates gain the abilities and types of that card).

Adventures.name: Pathfinding
Adventures.rules: Move your +1 Card token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Card).

Empires.name: City Quarter
Empires.rules: +2 ActionsReveal your hand. +1 Card per Action card revealed.

Empires.name: Engineer
Empires.rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. You may trash this. If you do, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

Empires.name: Overlord
Empires.rules: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing up to 5 Coins. This is that card until it leaves play.

Empires.name: Royal Blacksmith
Empires.rules: +5 CardsReveal your hand; discard the Coppers.

Empires.name: Encampment/Plunder
Empires.rules: This pile starts the game with 5 copies of Encampment on top, then 5 copies of Plunder. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

Empires.name: Patrician/Emporium
Empires.rules: This pile starts the game with 5 copies of Patrician on top, then 5 copies of Emporium. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

Empires.name: Settlers/Bustling Village
Empires.rules: This pile starts the game with 5 copies of Settlers on top, then 5 copies of Bustling Village. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

Empires.name: Castles
Empires.rules: Sort the castle pile by cost, putting the more expensive Castles on the bottom. For a 2-player game, use only one of each Castle. Only the top card of the pile may be gained or bought.

Empires.name: Catapult/Rocks
Empires.rules: This pile starts the game with 5 copies of Catapult on top, then 5 copies of Rocks. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

Empires.name: Chariot Race
Empires.rules: +1 Action

Empires.name: Enchantress
Empires.rules: Until your next turn, the first time each other player plays an Action card on their turn, they get +1 Card and +1 Action instead of following its instructions.At the start of your next turn,+1 Cards

Empires.name: Farmer's Market
Empires.rules: +1 BuyIf there are 4 Victory or more on the Farmer's Market Supply pile, take them and trash this. Otherwise, add 1 Victory to the pile and then +1 Coin per 1 Victory on the pile.

Empires.name: Gladiator/Fortune
Empires.rules: This pile starts the game with 5 copies of Gladiator on top, then 5 copies of Fortune. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

Empires.name: Sacrifice
Empires.rules: Trash a card from your hand. If it's an...Action card, +1 Cards, +2 ActionsTreasure card, +2 CoinsVictory card, +2 Victory

Empires.name: Temple
Empires.rules: +1 VictoryTrash from 1 to 3 differently named cards from your hand. Add 1 Victory to the Temple Supply pile.When you gain this, take all the Victory from the Temple Supply pile.

Empires.name: Villa
Empires.rules: +2 Actions+1 Buy+1 CoinWhen you gain this, put it into your hand, +1 Action, and if it's your Buy phase return to your Action phase.

Empires.name: Archive
Empires.rules: +1 ActionSet aside the top 3 cards of your deck face down (you may look at them). Now and at the start of your next two turns, put one into your hand.

Empires.name: Capital
Empires.rules: 6 Coins+1 BuyWhen you discard this from play, take 6 Debt, and then you may pay off Debt.

Empires.name: Charm
Empires.rules: When you play this, choose one: +1 Buy and +2 Coins; or the next time you buy a card this turn, you may also gain a differently named card with the same cost.

Empires.name: Crown
Empires.rules: If it's your Action phase, you may play an Action from your hand twice. If it's your Buy phase, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice.

Empires.name: Forum
Empires.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionDiscard 2 cards.When you buy this, +1 Buy.

Empires.name: Groundskeeper
Empires.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionWhile this is in play, when you gain a Victory card, +1 Victory.

Empires.name: Legionary
Empires.rules: +3 CoinsYou may reveal a Gold from your hand. If you do, each other player discards down to 2 cards in hand, then draws a card.

Empires.name: Wild Hunt
Empires.rules: Choose one: +3 Cards and add 1 Victory to the Wild Hunt Supply pile; or gain an Estate, and if you do, take the Victory from the pile.

Empires.name: Advance
Empires.rules: You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you do, gain an Action card costing up to 6 Coins.

Empires.name: Annex
Empires.rules: Look through your discard pile. Shuffle all but up to 5 cards from it into your deck. Gain a Duchy.

Empires.name: Donate
Empires.rules: After this turn, put all cards from your deck and discard pile into your hand, trash any number, shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 5 cards.

Empires.name: Triumph
Empires.rules: Gain an Estate.BBIf you did, +1 Victory per card you've gained this turn.

Empires.name: Delve
Empires.rules: +1 BuyBBGain a Silver.

Empires.name: Tax
Empires.rules: Add 2 Debt to a Supply pile.HHSetup: Add 1 Debt to each Supply pile. When a player buys a card, they take the Debt from its pile.

Empires.name: Banquet
Empires.rules: Gain 2 Coppers and a non-Victory card costing up to 5 Coins.

Empires.name: Ritual
Empires.rules: Gain a Curse. If you do, trash a card from your hand. +1 Victory per 1 Coin it cost.

Empires.name: Salt the Earth
Empires.rules: +1 VictoryBBTrash a Victory card from the Supply.

Empires.name: Wedding
Empires.rules: +1 VictoryBBGain a Gold.

Empires.name: Windfall
Empires.rules: If your deck and discard pile are empty, gain 3 Golds.

Empires.name: Conquest
Empires.rules: Gain 2 Silvers.+1 Victory per Silver you've gained this turn.

Empires.name: Dominate
Empires.rules: Gain a Province. If you do, +9 Victory

Empires.name: Aqueduct
Empires.rules: When you gain a Treasure, move 1 Victory from its pile to this.BBWhen you gain a Victory card, take the Victory from this.HHSetup: Put 8 Victory on the Silver and Gold piles.

Empires.name: Arena
Empires.rules: At the start of your Buy phase, you may discard an Action card. If you do, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Put 6 Victory here per player.

Empires.name: Bandit Fort
Empires.rules: When scoring, -2 Victory for each Silver and each Gold you have.

Empires.name: Basilica
Empires.rules: When you buy a card, if you have 2 Coins or more left, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Plus 6 Victory here per player.

Empires.name: Baths
Empires.rules: When you end your turn without having gained a card, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Put 6 Victory here per player.

Empires.name: Battlefield
Empires.rules: When you gain a Victory card, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Put 6 Victory here per player.

Empires.name: Colonnade
Empires.rules: When you buy an Action card, if you have a copy of it in play, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Put 6 Victory here per player.

Empires.name: Defiled Shrine
Empires.rules: When you gain an Action, move 1 Victory from its pile to this. When you buy a Curse, take the Victory from this.HHSetup: Put 2 Victory on each non-Gathering Action Supply pile.

Empires.name: Fountain
Empires.rules: When scoring, 15 Victory if you have at least 10 Coppers.

Empires.name: Keep
Empires.rules: When scoring, 5 Victory per differently named Treasure you have, that you have more copies of than each other player, or tied for most.

Empires.name: Labyrinth
Empires.rules: When you gain a 2nd card in one of your turns, take 2 Victory from here.HHSetup: Put 6 Victory here per player.

Empires.name: Mountain Pass
Empires.rules: When you are the first player to gain a Province, after that turn, each player bids once, up to 40 Debt, ending with you. High bidder gets +8 Victory and takes the Debt they bid.

Empires.name: Museum
Empires.rules: When scoring, 2 Victory per differently named card you have.

Empires.name: Obelisk
Empires.rules: When scoring, 2 Victory per card you have from the chosen pile.HHSetup: Choose a random Action Supply pile.

Empires.name: Orchard
Empires.rules: When scoring, 4 Victory per differently named Action card you have 3 or more copies of.

Empires.name: Palace
Empires.rules: When scoring, 3 Victory per set you have of Copper - Silver - Gold.

Empires.name: Tomb
Empires.rules: When you trash a card, +1 Victory.

Empires.name: Tower
Empires.rules: When scoring, 1 Victory per non-Victory card you have from an empty Supply pile.

Empires.name: Triumphal Arch
Empires.rules: When scoring, 3 Victory per copy you have of the 2nd most common Action card among your cards (if it's a tie, count either).

Empires.name: Wall
Empires.rules: When scoring, -1 Victory per card you have after the first 15.

Empires.name: Wolf Den
Empires.rules: When scoring, -3 Victory per card you have exactly one copy of.

2nd.name: Harbinger
2nd.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionLook through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.

2nd.name: Merchant
2nd.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionThe first tim eyou play a Silver this turn, +1 Coin.

2nd.name: Vassal
2nd.rules: +2 CoinsDiscard the top card of your deck. If it's an Action card, you may play it.

2nd.name: Poacher
2nd.rules: +1 Card+1 Action+1 CoinDiscard a card per empty Supply pile.

2nd.name: Bandit
2nd.rules: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes a revealed Treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.

2nd.name: Sentry
2nd.rules: +1 Card+1 ActionLook at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

2nd.name: Artisan
2nd.rules: Gain a card to your hand costing up to 5 Coins.Put a card from yoru hand onto your deck.
